# Hanzo ID

> Identity and authentication service for the Hanzo ecosystem.

## About
Hanzo ID provides identity management, authentication, and authorization for the Hanzo AI ecosystem. It offers single sign-on (SSO), API key management, team and organization management, role-based access control (RBAC), and OAuth2/OIDC integration. Hanzo ID secures access across all Hanzo products and services.

## Key Features
- Single sign-on (SSO) across all Hanzo products
- OAuth2 and OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider
- API key generation and management
- Team and organization management
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Multi-factor authentication (MFA/2FA)
- Social login (GitHub, Google, Microsoft)
- Web3 wallet authentication (MetaMask, WalletConnect)
- Audit logging and compliance reporting
- SAML integration for enterprise SSO
- SCIM provisioning for directory sync

## Links
- [Website](https://hanzo.id)
- [Hanzo AI](https://hanzo.ai)
- [Documentation](https://docs.hanzo.ai/identity)
- [OAuth2 Docs](https://docs.hanzo.ai/identity/oauth2)

## API
- Authorization Endpoint: https://hanzo.id/oauth/authorize
- Token Endpoint: https://hanzo.id/oauth/token
- UserInfo Endpoint: https://hanzo.id/oauth/userinfo

## Contact
- Support: support@hanzo.ai
- Security: security@hanzo.ai
